about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm a programmer since 2019, I study CS and AI at the University of London and I will graduate with honors in 2024
about.secondary: I want to land a job that will enable me to earn and grow in the fields of AI and data, I'm continuously looking for new exciting opportunities!

projects.title: International Food Corner
projects.description: I worked on this project in collaboration with a team from different parts of the world where I played a critical part in designing and implementing the website for both the front-end and back-end, using a minimal tech stack of javascript, HTML, CSS, Handlebars.js, mocha, and Bootstrap, the website dynamically generates and displays content for users based on interaction. Followed Agile methodology, object-oriented programming, test-driven development, secure programming, dynamic programming, and programming best practices.

projects.title: Data Portal
projects.description: Searched, analyzed, cleaned, and organized a Kaggle dataset into 6NF normalized SQL database tables. Designed and developed a node app using Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Express, mustache, and MySQL. The website front-end centered around dynamically populated selectors that allow users to query the data and answer their questions simply without needing to know programming or SQL.

projects.title: Rocket First Stage Landing Prediction
projects.description: Data Science & Machine Learning Project. Where I used (Python, Jupyter Notebook, Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Dash) to perform data collection, cleaning, analysis, visualization, training ML models, predictions, and accuracy testing, and comparison of different ML algorithms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
